data.quote: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can’t, you’re right.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: I believe that you should praise people whenever you can; It causes them to respond as a thirsty plant responds to water.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: For every failure there’s an alternative course of action. you just have to find it.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Throw out the words, if I can, I hope, and maybe, and replace them with I can, I will, I must.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Everyone has an invisible sign hanging from their neck saying, make me feel important. Never forget this message when working with people.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Most people live and die with their music still unplayed. They never dare to try.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Aerodynamically, the bumblebee shouldn’t be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn’t know it so it goes on flying anyway.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: We must have a theme, a goal, a purpose in our lives. If you don’t know where you’re aiming, you don’t have a goal.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Even the smallest achievements pave a way to great success.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: God didn’t have time to make a nobody, only a somebody. I believe that each of us has God-given talents within us waiting to be brought to fruition.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Every failure, obstacle or hardship is an opportunity in disguise.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Success, in many cases, is failure turned inside out.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: The greatest pollution problem we face today is negativity. Eliminate the negative attitude and believe you can do anything.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: Don’t let the negatives of life control you. Rise above them. Use them as your stepping stones to go higher than you ever dreamed possible.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: A good goal is like a strenuous exercise – it makes you stretch.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: You cannot keep determined people from success.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: We treat our people like royalty. If you honour and serve the people who work for you, they will honour and serve you.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash
